languages.text: "Номос следует... изучить. Если единице ван Калоксу станет спокойнее, могу добавить, что изучение включает в себя и исследование методов умерщвления единицы Номос".
"Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."
languages.original_text: "Номос следует... изучить. Если единице ван Калоксу станет спокойнее, могу добавить, что изучение включает в себя и исследование методов умерщвления единицы Номос".

traits.locale_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."
"Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."
"Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."
"Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

languages.text: “诺莫斯应该……进行研究。我可以扩大研究范围，包括研究杀死诺莫斯这一单位的方法，如果这么做可以让冯·卡洛克斯这一单位感觉好些的话。”
languages.original_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

traits.locale_text: “诺莫斯应该……进行研究。我可以扩大研究范围，包括研究杀死诺莫斯这一单位的方法，如果这么做可以让冯·卡洛克斯这一单位感觉好些的话。”

languages.text: « Nomos doit être... étudié. Si cela peut rassurer l'unité van Calox, je pourrais étendre le champ de l'étude afin d'inclure la recherche de méthodes d'élimination de l'unité Nomos. »
languages.original_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

traits.locale_text: « Nomos doit être... étudié. Si cela peut rassurer l'unité van Calox, je pourrais étendre le champ de l'étude afin d'inclure la recherche de méthodes d'élimination de l'unité Nomos. »

languages.text: «Deberíamos... estudiar a Nomos. Si esto hace que la unidad van Calox se sienta mejor, puedo ampliar el ámbito del estudio para incluir formas de matar a la unidad Nomos».
languages.original_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

traits.locale_text: «Deberíamos... estudiar a Nomos. Si esto hace que la unidad van Calox se sienta mejor, puedo ampliar el ámbito del estudio para incluir formas de matar a la unidad Nomos».

languages.text: 「ノモスは…研究対象とすべきだ。ユニット、ヴァン・キャロックスの気休めになるかはわからぬが、私は研究範囲をユニット、ノモスの殺傷方法を含むよう拡大してもよい」
languages.original_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

traits.locale_text: 「ノモスは…研究対象とすべきだ。ユニット、ヴァン・キャロックスの気休めになるかはわからぬが、私は研究範囲をユニット、ノモスの殺傷方法を含むよう拡大してもよい」

languages.text: "Nomos sollte ... studiert werden. Wenn es die Einheit van Calox beruhigt, kann ich die Studie erweitern und auch Methoden für eine Tötung der Einheit Nomos erforschen."
languages.original_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos sollte ... studiert werden. Wenn es die Einheit van Calox beruhigt, kann ich die Studie erweitern und auch Methoden für eine Tötung der Einheit Nomos erforschen."

languages.original_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

languages.text: "Nomos'un üzerine çalışmalıyız. Van Calox birimi daha iyi hissedecekse araştırma konusunu Nomos birimini öldürme yöntemlerini içerecek şekilde genişletebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Nomos should be... studied. If it makes the unit van Calox feel any better, I could broaden the study's scope to include research into methods for killing the unit Nomos."

traits.locale_text: "Nomos'un üzerine çalışmalıyız. Van Calox birimi daha iyi hissedecekse araştırma konusunu Nomos birimini öldürme yöntemlerini içerecek şekilde genişletebilirim."
